description.value:
Source PZO9445

Price 1 gp; Weight -

Cold iron is often used to produce alloyed metals, catalysts, and items that interfere with magic.

Alchemical Power Component

Doses 5 (5 gp); Spells abjuration school

Spells of the abjuration school are cast at +1 caster level for the purpose of caster level and dispel checks.
